interpretation: The Cook card represents the importance of nourishment and the creativity that goes into creating a delicious meal. This card reminds us of the hard work and dedication required to bring something to fruition, whether it be a meal or a project. The Cook encourages us to take pride in our work and to share our talents with others. This card may also indicate a need for self-care, reminding us to nourish ourselves both physically and emotionally. In a reading, the Cook can represent someone who is skilled in their craft and takes pleasure in providing for others. This card can also suggest a need to put in the effort and work required to achieve our goals.
